story:
After three successful campaigns, £87,639 funded with 3300+ backers and fulfilled 10000+ products, we’ve gone back to our roots. For our next campaign we decided to upgrade our 1st design and now we are back with foliage notebook 2.0. A new design with more features.

The Story of Foliage Notebook

Foliage came to me one day as I was sorting through my notebooks. As a designer, traveller, and foodie, I need to take three or more notebooks with me, I thought it wastime I needed a better solution:

 

 Foliage has a unique binding system which allows it to support up to four interchangeable notebooks at a time. These can be removed, rearranged and combined easily and quickly.

 

Keep all your thoughts into one place. Whether you need a planner, a diary, to-do lists, manuscript paper or just need to be organized and more productive, the Foliage is ideal.

The inner notebooks can be swapped out and changed on the fly making it ideal for anyone who needs a variety of media in their lives.

 

For last year's words belong to last year's language and next year's words await another voice. And to make an end is to make a beginning.”-T. S. Eliot

 

One Journal/Six Notebooks/A Two-Year Planner

Foliage 2-year journal serves as a delightful time capsule and planner in one. Our newest design divided the 2-year journal into 6 single notebooks,  every two months simply change out of the two-month notebooks. You don't need to carry the heavy and thick whole year journal in hands.

 

Unique Mirrored Page Design for 2020/2021

Each page carries back to back entries for two successive years in a mirror image fashion. That means opening it left to right will show you 2020 and right to left will open your journal for 2021.

All pages feature the date and plenty of writing space to meet everyone’s needs. The papers are dotted grid which are just the right amount of print to keep things aligned while not distracting from your writing or creativity.

 

Encrypt Your Journal with Scratch Stickers for Secret Messages

The time capsule is a great journaling tool you can use to raise awareness about the direction your life is taking, as well as capture your current wisdom and memories.

Now you can leave yourself coded messages with the scratch stickers and check them on the same day next year.

 

A Keepsake

The Foliage 2-year journal is designed to be treasured. It comes with a stylish slip case, which makes the perfect final resting place for your journal. It looks awesome when you line several up on your bookshelf.

 

The Foliage Notebook is available in charcoal black/wool felt cover, light grey/wool felt cover, or earth black/full-grain leather. Customize your own notebook by choosing your favourite colour.   

 

The internal notebooks are interchangeable, refillable and recyclable. Each foliage can accommodate upto four internal notebooks, choose your own papers to create the perfect combination for your own needs.  

 

The desk-size notebook is the perfect companion for those anyone needing space to create, sketch, draft, compose at your leisure with the A5 sized desk-top Foliage.

 

Free Personalized Name

Want your foliage notebook to be exclusive or want to make a special gift to special person?

Leather Notebook: Engraved Name Upto 6 Letter

Wool Felt Notebook: Built-in Initial Stud 1 Letter Only

 

Unlimited Possibilities

Every foliage notebook comes with a transparent pocket folders. This convenient add-on has 2 flaps. One side with zipper pockets for stickers, cards and receipts, another with 3 business card slots and a long pockets for rulers, pens and other stationary.
story_txt:
After three successful campaigns, £87,639 funded with 3300+ backers and fulfilled 10000+ products, we’ve gone back to our roots. For our next campaign we decided to upgrade our 1st design and now we are back with foliage notebook 2.0. A new design with more features.

The Story of Foliage Notebook
Foliage came to me one day as I was sorting through my notebooks. As a designer, traveller, and foodie, I need to take three or more notebooks with me, I thought it wastime I needed a better solution:

 

 Foliage has a unique binding system which allows it to support up to four interchangeable notebooks at a time. These can be removed, rearranged and combined easily and quickly.

 

Keep all your thoughts into one place. Whether you need a planner, a diary, to-do lists, manuscript paper or just need to be organized and more productive, the Foliage is ideal.
The inner notebooks can be swapped out and changed on the fly making it ideal for anyone who needs a variety of media in their lives.

 

For last year's words belong to last year's language and next year's words await another voice. And to make an end is to make a beginning.”-T. S. Eliot
 
One Journal/Six Notebooks/A Two-Year Planner
Foliage 2-year journal serves as a delightful time capsule and planner in one. Our newest design divided the 2-year journal into 6 single notebooks,  every two months simply change out of the two-month notebooks. You don't need to carry the heavy and thick whole year journal in hands.

 
Unique Mirrored Page Design for 2020/2021
Each page carries back to back entries for two successive years in a mirror image fashion. That means opening it left to right will show you 2020 and right to left will open your journal for 2021.
All pages feature the date and plenty of writing space to meet everyone’s needs. The papers are dotted grid which are just the right amount of print to keep things aligned while not distracting from your writing or creativity.


 
Encrypt Your Journal with Scratch Stickers for Secret Messages
The time capsule is a great journaling tool you can use to raise awareness about the direction your life is taking, as well as capture your current wisdom and memories.
Now you can leave yourself coded messages with the scratch stickers and check them on the same day next year.

 
A Keepsake
The Foliage 2-year journal is designed to be treasured. It comes with a stylish slip case, which makes the perfect final resting place for your journal. It looks awesome when you line several up on your bookshelf.

 

The Foliage Notebook is available in charcoal black/wool felt cover, light grey/wool felt cover, or earth black/full-grain leather. Customize your own notebook by choosing your favourite colour.   
 

The internal notebooks are interchangeable, refillable and recyclable. Each foliage can accommodate upto four internal notebooks, choose your own papers to create the perfect combination for your own needs.  

 

The desk-size notebook is the perfect companion for those anyone needing space to create, sketch, draft, compose at your leisure with the A5 sized desk-top Foliage.

 
Free Personalized Name
Want your foliage notebook to be exclusive or want to make a special gift to special person?
Leather Notebook: Engraved Name Upto 6 Letter

Wool Felt Notebook: Built-in Initial Stud 1 Letter Only

 
Unlimited Possibilities
Every foliage notebook comes with a transparent pocket folders. This convenient add-on has 2 flaps. One side with zipper pockets for stickers, cards and receipts, another with 3 business card slots and a long pockets for rulers, pens and other stationary.

story:
NOTE: To receive a perk, be sure to click the box of the perk you want on the right side of the page before checking out!

Novel Synopsis

With compelling lyricism, Hum A Radiant Sickness takes the reader on a surreal romp through the subconscious of a young man teetering on the ledge between a terrifying but hallowed self-actualization and the begrudging contentedness of an imposed conformity.

Conor Fallow sees his massive student loan debt as a barrier preventing him from achieving something meaningful with his life. As his senior year is coming to a close, however, he’s adopted an escapist attitude—picking up self-destructive habits and doing his best to ignore his future. While on a nightly walk filled with alcohol and malpracticed meditation, Conor runs into an old friend, Luce, who invites him to take part in a strange urban rite. Their guides, Jim-Jam and No Name explain that the aesthetic of the scene, looking out from a particular point atop a parking garage, is so intense that it creates a powerful psychedelic effect. Conor is skeptical but is willing to try it. To his surprise, and horror, looking out at the city does have a profound effect on his psyche…

A young man simultaneously discovers his ambition and confronts the knowledge that he cannot pursue that ambition. He squirms within the confines of this paralysis. We weep for him, and we laugh with him at the absurdity of our situation. We laugh and laugh—and we don’t give up.

Can We Read A Sample Chapter?

Yep. Here you go.

And you can join my mailing list here.

What's Your Plan & Budget?

You will be helping to fund the publication and initial marketing of my debut novel, Hum A Radiant Sickness. I plan to release mid-March 2017. The majority of the production work has been completed, and the methods I’ve chosen for distribution incur minimal upfront costs. This campaign is focused largely on raising funds to help market and promote the novel. I need to get the word out, and I need your help. Here’s my plan and budget for this campaign.

  • Production - $300
  • Distribution - $300
  • Marketing - $1,400
  • Travel & Promo - $900
  • Total: $2,900

Production - $300

  • All copy has been drafted and edited, and the manuscript has been formatted for each distribution channel.
  • Cover Design: $300 – Hiring a professional designer to complete the artwork and layout of my cover for both the eBook and print editions.

Distribution - $300

E-books comprise 30-35 percent of all US book sales. 60 percent or more of all US book sales (both print and digital) happen through an online retailer, primarily Amazon. My plan of attack is to publish in Kindle eBook format through Amazon KDP and print on demand (POD) format through CreateSpace (selling via Amazon). I will expand into other eBook and print markets through distributors targeting the non-Amazon space, as follows:

  • CreateSpace: POD edition via Amazon sales (no upfront cost)
  • Amazon KDP: eBook sales via Amazon (no upfront cost)
  • IngramSpark: POD edition for markets outside of Amazon ($50)
  • Draft2Digital: eBook sales to markets outside of Amazon (no upfront cost)

I will need to purchase a unique ISBN for the print edition and each eBook edition.

  • 10x ISBN @ http://myidentifiers.com/ - $250

Marketing - $1,400

  • Advanced Reviews & Website Features - $300
  • Website Hosting: $25 / month WordPress @ 12 months - $300 (Website currently in development)
  • Digital Banner Ad Design: $50
  • Google AdWords Budget (PPC): $250 (5 month budget @ $50 per month)
  • Placeit Graphic Design - $50
  • Business Card Printing (250x) - $40
  • Stickers (100x) - $40
  • Bookmarks (100x) - $40
  • Stencil Printing (100x) - $50
  • Banner Poster Design - $200
  • Banner Poster & Stand for promotion at speaking ops and events - $100

Travel & Other - $900

  • Travel, Speaking & Events to Promote the Book: $250 to cover gas and food for brief weekend excursions. Semi-local over first several months. Targeting universities, literary events and open mics.
  • Book Release & Launch Party - $250
  • Indiegogo Perk Supplement - $250
  • Indiegogo Fee Coverage (5% of $2750) – ~$150

What Will You Do If We Exceed Your Goal?

All additional funds beyond my stated goal will be used to increase my marketing budget. You will be helping me to expand visibility and promote additional sales.

If we get to $5,000, all backers will be included on a list to receive a free eBook copy of my second novel, Blank Holiday, when ready for publication. I’ll also hold the “Rocky” pose for 30 minutes atop the parking garage in Charleston, SC that inspired this novel.

What If The Goal Is Not Met?

This is a reasonable funding goal to back the publishing and marketing of my novel. I believe it is achievable (fingers crossed). If it is not met, the available funds in the campaign will still go to me (with a fee to Indiegogo). I will move forward with publishing through the distributors noted above. My marketing, travel and promo budget will have to be cut, however, limiting my reach. All backers will still receive their perks, even if the goal is not met. 

Who The Hell Is Patrick Bryant?

I’m a writer, literary nerd, digital marketing professional and buckle-down worker. I’ve earned a B.A. and M.A. in English Literature and have published award-winning fiction, poetry and literary criticism. In 2010, I received the Pocataligo prize for poetry, and my work has been featured by Kakalak, Yemassee Journal and the South Carolina Poetry Initiative among other publications. An initial draft of Hum A Radiant Sickness was completed for my master’s thesis. That draft has since seen significant edits and been extended by ~75 pages. I’m ramping up the marketing and launch attack for this debut novel, and I’m also in the process of drafting my second novel, Blank Holiday—but we’ll talk about that later.

After graduating with my MA, I took off on an 11,000-mile road trip with two of my best friends, traveling counter-clockwise around the United States and Canada. Settled out of the blur, I’ve been working full-time as a marketing professional (about 2.5 years now). In my current role as a content manager for a digital marketing agency, I manage digital content marketing and SEO for 40 brands and counting.

I’ve wanted to be a writer ever since I was a kid. I’ve achieved that goal and now have a new one. I want to share my work with all of you, and the rest of the world. Leveraging all of the literary and marketing skills I’ve acquired over the years, I’ll apply a good measure of elbow grease and accomplish that goal—with your help.

No Cash? You Can Still Help.

  • Spread the word by sharing this crowd-funding campaign. Use the "Share" buttons in the top right corner to post on social media, whisper the title of the book in the ears of passersby, write this URL on a slip of paper and hand it under the bathroom stall, etc.
  • Subscribe to my mailing list. I’ll provide news and updates, and you’ll be the first to know about events and promotions. You’ll also get the latest on any new works, and I promise I won’t fill up your inbox.

THANK YOU!!!

Don't forget to subscribe to my mailing list!

story:
It is an empowerment book for children about the heroic adventures of an 8 years old displaced girl called Sarah. 

Sarah is strong and curious, and can talk to the elements of nature who guide her to overcome the hardships. She keeps believing in her dream until it becomes true.

This is a mockup image of the book, the final cover may look different

In this campaign you can get an early bird copy of the book, or donate a book to a displaced child and get your donation certificate as a gift card. You can do BOTH!

We were invited to read this story for 120 Swedish students in one of Stockholm’s best schools. 100 % positive responses from the students and the teachers.

Check out what the 6th grade Swedish students wrote in the survey:

The book provides displaced children with positive mental images, and brings them a role-model that shares their experiences and manages to overcome the hardships.  

We cannot send a psychologist to every child, but we can integrate therapy in powerful stories. A book is a low-cost therapy tool that can reach children everywhere.  

The author spent 20 months of research, testing and consulting a range of professionals in different countries, including professors of psychology at the Universities of Vienna and Stockholm, The therapy in the book relies on principles of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and exposure therapy.

1. The eBook: 

A beautifully illustrated eBook delivered straight to your inbox. Available at first in 3 languages : English, Swedish, Arabic

2. The book:

A beautiful 38 pages hardcover book, in (11˝ X 8.5˝) landscape format, with vibrant color illustrations, printed in high quality and delivered right to your doorstep. Available at first in 3 languages : English, Swedish, Arabic.

3. Donations:

Spend your gift money on making the world a better place for hundreds of displaced children. Your donations will go to children in refugee camps in Lebanon, Turkey and Jordan.

The donated books will be printed in Arabic, the logistics will be coordinated by our partner organisation Molham Team. The delivery report with photos will be sent to you from the NGO's official email.

4. Therapist & Educator guidebook:
A professional booklet guide about the therapeutic purpose behind each metaphor in the book, including guidelines for educators about the educational purposes of the book and how it explains human rights and bridges cultures. 

5. Get your name in the book & Chat with the author on Skype:

Get your name listed in the book with team of experts and collaborators who helped bringing this book to life. The author will be happy to talk to you about his journey, the origin of the project and other stories that will inspire you.

  •  It’s Universal: The metaphors in the book are based on the universal elements of nature to appeal to all children, regardless of their background. Nature connects all children in the world
  • It bridges cultures: We have organized several book readings in different languages for both displaced and European children, in collaboration with Stockholm House of Culture & City Theater The results have been AMAZING
  • Based on science, therapy through storytelling: It provides refugee children with positive mental images. It relies on principles of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and exposure therapy, and is validated by professors of psychology at the Universities of Vienna and Stockholm.
  • It endorses gender equality:  With a strong female hero character, the book projects children from both genders as equal.
  • It encourages integration: The book encourages displaced children to integrate in their new society and become positive members of it. It helps children from all origins realize what they have in common and focus the shared values between humans. 
  • It is a dream catalyst: The book encourages all children to believe in their dreams and to have a positive image of their future. Displaced children need to feel safe and at home in their new environment. This book connects the idea of feeling at home with having a positive self-image and a dream for the future.

Sarah's journey was written by me, Imad Elabdala. I am a Syrian refugee, now based in Sweden. I have been on the same journey as Sarah, and I have seen many children whose dreams and childhoods were being destroyed in the war. I managed to settle and to get a decent job while rebuilding my life in Sweden, but the issue of those children could not leave my mind. So I put my career aside, and dedicated the last 20 months of my life to working on this book. I started by consulting professionals with the intention of developing a sustainable global tool that brings healing to traumatized children who experienced displacement. I was developing the story while volunteering at the Red Cross on the Slovenian-Croatian border in 2015 to help refugees who were coming to Europe. 

I believe that stories can shape our personalities and identities. That is how Sarah was born. Back in Sweden, I worked on building Kidnovation, a media innovation lab for displaced children, and Sarah’s Journey is our first product.

Where are we now?

We have printed the Beta version of the book using our character design, initial illustrations and the genuine drawings of the children. We use these books for our book-reading activities and school visits.

We need your help to:  

Hire a professional illustrator to work with a psychologist and bring the best healing results. 

Hire an editor, and translators. 

Print the first 1000 copies of the book for you and for the refugee children, and secure the logistics to deliver the donated copies to the NGOs.

Special thanks for the video company Future Museum for their help with the amazing video  

Special thanks for the talented illustrator Gorazd Vahen for helping with the character study of Sarah  

Thanks from the heart to all the great team who helped this project come to life

story:
The Gospel Set

 

The Bible doesn’t have to be intimidating.

We were inspired by the way scripture was originally written, by individual authors with diverse points of view. Manuscripts is printing the books of the Bible in easy to read volumes that are beautiful and small enough to place in your pocket. 

To start, we’re printing the Gospels: Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John.

Inside the books

These pocket-sized books are designed to make reading the Bible less daunting. 

Each Gospel is formatted like a traditional book. The text is arranged in one column, without verse numbers or footnotes. 

We used the New American Standard Bible, a translation widely respected for its word-for-word accuracy. Jesus’ words are printed in red and are placed in their own paragraphs for emphasis.

 

Dimensions

These books are 5.5 inches tall x 3.75 inches wide x less than 1 inch deep. Easy to hold, easy to read, easy to carry. 

Easily fits in pockets and purses

 

Thin enough to go anywhere

 

Manuscripts compared to the Washburn College Bible

 

What You Get

The Gospel Set

 

 

We are so excited to get these books in peoples hands! As a supporter of this Indiegogo project, you not only get a set of books for yourself, but you get to be part of pushing Manuscripts mission to make the Bible less intimidating for all. When you back this project you get us one step closer to moving forward with our goal of publishing the Bible, not just the Gospels, in individual, easy-to-read volumes.

 

Benefits

Easier to read 

Designed with bigger font, thicker pages, one column of text, and no verse numbers to make the Bible easier to read.

 

Portable

The rounded edges, durable cover, and small size make these books perfect for daily use.

 

Thoughtful Design

We thought through every detail of these books, from how the cover feels to how Jesus' words are presented, to make something we know you'll love!

 

The Big Picture

Our dream doesn't stop with the Gospels

We started with the Gospels because of the role they play in the Bible as a whole. Jesus is the most significant figure in human history and the Gospels are the Bible's accounts of His life and teachings. For the future, our goal is to produce the entire Bible in individual volumes that are more approachable.

When you back this project you support this vision.

 

Background

The idea behind Manuscripts began with a New Testament History class. In this course, I learned about how the Bible became what is now. I was fascinated by how dozens of individual works were adopted into the singular collection that became the canonical Bible we read today.

From my work designing websites, I realized the way information is formatted and shown directly impacts whether people stay and read or leave and never come back. I felt like my Bible was not easy to approach, at least not for the casual reader. 

The way people consume information has vastly changed over the years. Attention spans are shorter. Heavy books with tissue-thin pages densely crowded with text feel overwhelming and intimidating. Applying the same thought process I used in building websites, I began to think about how the Bible could become less intimidating. I knew that the text wasn’t boring, but the format was keeping many from reading it actively.

Then it hit me. Why not go back to the past? Why not go back to the manuscripts, when the focus was on the authors and the text existed as separate volumes? Today, the entire Bible and virtually endless amounts of information exist at our fingertips with smartphones and computers. What most people want from a book is a better reading experience, not more clutter.

By printing the books of the Bible in individual volumes, one can enjoy all the benefits of a traditional book. You can do away with see-through pages and tiny fonts and instead hold something sturdy and easy to read. By removing verse numbers and notes in the margins we can create a distraction-free experience that allows the reader to focus on the Bible’s amazing stories.

-Giancarlo Ospina, Manuscripts Co-founder

 

Funding

With your help, we will continue to produce The Gospels in our distinct format and launch a vision that goes far beyond Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John. We have the books designed, we have our printer selected, our concept has been tested, and we have already successfully funded our first printing of The Gospels. Now, you can back this project with confidence, knowing that you will help us continue to get The Gospels into more hands.

In the end, we just want to see more people reading the Bible. These books are a way for people to add scripture to their daily life. And for those who have never read the Bible, they’re a new chance to see what the Gospels actually say.

 

Testimonials
story_txt: The Gospel Set The Bible doesn’t have to be intimidating.We were inspired by the way scripture was originally written, by individual authors with diverse points of view. Manuscripts is printing the books of the Bible in easy to read volumes that are beautiful and small enough to place in your pocket. To start, we’re printing the Gospels: Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John.Inside the booksThese pocket-sized books are designed to make reading the Bible less daunting. Each Gospel is formatted like a traditional book. The text is arranged in one column, without verse numbers or footnotes. We used the New American Standard Bible, a translation widely respected for its word-for-word accuracy. Jesus’ words are printed in red and are placed in their own paragraphs for emphasis. DimensionsThese books are 5.5 inches tall x 3.75 inches wide x less than 1 inch deep. Easy to hold, easy to read, easy to carry. Easily fits in pockets and purses Thin enough to go anywhere Manuscripts compared to the Washburn College Bible What You GetThe Gospel Set  We are so excited to get these books in peoples hands! As a supporter of this Indiegogo project, you not only get a set of books for yourself, but you get to be part of pushing Manuscripts mission to make the Bible less intimidating for all. When you back this project you get us one step closer to moving forward with our goal of publishing the Bible, not just the Gospels, in individual, easy-to-read volumes. BenefitsEasier to read Designed with bigger font, thicker pages, one column of text, and no verse numbers to make the Bible easier to read. PortableThe rounded edges, durable cover, and small size make these books perfect for daily use. Thoughtful DesignWe thought through every detail of these books, from how the cover feels to how Jesus' words are presented, to make something we know you'll love! The Big PictureOur dream doesn't stop with the GospelsWe started with the Gospels because of the role they play in the Bible as a whole. Jesus is the most significant figure in human history and the Gospels are the Bible's accounts of His life and teachings. story:
Story of My Book

House Call: Understanding How Telemedicine is Poised to Transform Healthcare in Rural America and Beyond

My name is Anna Daccache and I am the author of House Call. I wrote this book because America faces a real crisis of a lack of access to care especially in rural communities, and particularly mental health care.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how telemedicine is in a position to revolutionize our approach to seeking out care. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for making health care more accessible in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you understand the barriers that exist which keep folks from receiving necessary care and how telemedicine is in a position to overcome those barriers.

In this book, you'll learn about:
  • The state of mental health in America
  • How telemedicine is already being implemented to combat lack of access to care in rural areas
  • Leaders and innovators in the telemedicine space

You will love this book if you are interested in the debate of Medicare for All, have a passion for technology in medicine, and/or work in or care about mental health in our communities.

House Call is a non-fiction book that speaks to medical providers and politicians who are looking at how to make health care more accessible and and affordable by leveraging the technology available to us, for the first time.

 

The Book - House Call


The book is written in 3 Parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-3. This section breaks down why our healthcare system is the way it is today, the state of mental health in America, like how 10 million adults have unmet mental health care needs, and how COVID-19 has shaped the conversation surrounding telemedicine.

Part 2 contains Chapters 4-6. This section dives into the details of transforming the healthcare landscape, such as the access to care, the cost of care, and the role insurance plays in this discussion.

Part 3 contains Chapters 7-9. This section looks at leaders in the telemedicine space across political, medical, and technology landscapes.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July/August 2020.

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Fall 2020

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover

I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

 

About the Author

Anna Daccache is a candidate for a Masters of Computer Science at Northeastern’s Khoury College of Computer Science. She currently lives in San Jose, California.

Anna wrote this book because she has always been curious about how health care and technology can feed off of each other. She was also impassioned by her work at a health tech company that opened her eyes to the stark reality of trying to access care, especially for mental illness, in rural America, and was curious about why this wasn’t and isn’t a bigger talking point in medicine or politics.

Outside of graduate school and writing this book Anna is trying and surprisingly succeeding at being vegan, she's an ardent film geek, her first love was the beautiful game of football (soccer), and she is mildly obsessed with Architectural Digest house tours (check out Dakota Johnson’s for her dream home).

For more information you can connect with Anna at amdaccache@gmail.com and on Instagram: @bananadaccache.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people can't contribute finanacially, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #housecall and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Anna Daccache

story:
Thank you all for coming to the Indiegogo page! Take a look on the right and choose your pledge/reward perk. Your pledge will enable Space Knight Book 5 to be available on my store in ebook, audiobook, and possibly print. Thank you for pledging!

Stretch goal #1 is $30,000. If we hit that in funding, I’ll make sure Space Knight Book 5 is 100,000 words instead of the usual 80,000.

Stretch Goal #2 is $60,000. If we hit that funding, I’ll be able to do a mass market print run of the Space Knight books, and unsigned versions will be available in my store for fans to purchase. If that goal is not hit, there will not be print books available for sale outside of these crowdsourcing events.

Ebooks, audiobooks, and other digital goodies (art and behind the scenes video) will be delivered by the end of January, print books and morale patch by the end of March.

Pledgers will get advanced copies of the ebook, audio, and (if they pledge that tier) print books FOUR WEEKS before they are released to the public on my website, so if you want early access of the Space Knight story, this is the best way to get it!

New for this crowdfunding campaign is the morale patch. Here is the initial design:

 

 

 

Hi,

I’m Michael-Scott Earle, New York Times and USA Today bestselling author of fiction with 43 full-length and 4 short novels published. I write books for men, but not just any books. These are high octane and high dopamine fantasy and sci-fi stories about bad ass protaganists killing asshole villians and having sex with plenty of beautiful women. If you are a dude between the ages of 16 and 99 and you are looking for books/entertainment that will make you feel like a hero, then you’ve just discovered your favorite author.

 

My Space Knight novels are some of my best selling books. Space Knight is a story about a young man named Nicholas Lyons on his quest to become first a squire and then a knight in a fantastic sci-fi/fantasy world where Knights obtain better gear and currency by killing dragon-men-monsters named “Grendals” that emerge from portals on various planets in the galaxy. It’s a bit like Harry Potter, only the protaganist isn’t a third wheel, the books aren’t for kids, and lots of violence, beer drinking, and sex happens. Okay… so it’s not at all like Harry Potter. Maybe it’s a bit more like Warhammer 40k, only there is romance, comedy, every other paragraph isn’t about heresy, and the characters get more loot so they get more powerful. Okay… so it’s not at all like Warhammer 40k, either.

Space Knight is rather unique. It’s what is considered a “LitRPG” book, where the protagonist gets loot with stats that makes him more powerful. He also “levels” up from a lowly “Squire” into a full “Knight” class and is currently in the process of choosing a specialization.

Space Knight is also considered a “Harem” novel series, where the protagonist is romantically involved and sleeps with with more than one beautiful woman who are all okay with the situation because he's so awesome.

You will have a fantastic time reading this book, but don’t just take my word for it, you can download the first Space Knight novel on my website for free right now. Then you can read it on your Kindle/ebook reader/phone. If you prefer to listen to your books in the car or while you are working, you can also download the audiobook for free here.

 

 

Q: Wait. Did you just write that you do books for men? With awesome adventure, badass male protagonists, and beautiful women (like more than one?) that he sleeps with? Ummm. Are you allowed to do that? Isn’t it almost 2020?

A: I understand your confusion. You probably have one eyebrow raised. Maybe you are even looking over your shoulder to make sure you don’t get caught even reading this. Rejoice brother, in a world filled with entertainment for just women, you’ve found an author that just focuses on fun stories for men. But believe me, A LOT of people don’t like that I’m writing these awesome books. You’ll love them, though.

Q: I don’t read books, how can I get in on this awesome Space Knight loot grabbing, beer drinking, maiden banging action?

A: I’ve got some audio books! You can get the first one here on Bandcamp for free and, if you like it, you can get books 2-4 on my website in the next few weeks. Even if you don’t read, you still might want to try the ebook of Space Knight Book 1 for free. You can get it on your smartphone and spend a few minutes here and there reading it instead of surfing Facebook or playing games on your phone when you have downtime. I’ve had hundreds of readers tell me that they haven’t read a book since high school, but they got hooked on my books, read them all, and now really enjoy reading. I write super-fun action-packed books that are easy and enjoyable to read. 

Q: I don’t see an option to buy all the ebooks at once. Why not?

A: Because I don’t want to take your money without giving you value in return. Look, if I had an option for you to pledge for all five Space Knight ebooks, you’d get them all when the Indiegogo was done, but chances are, you’d probably forget to ever read them or have something else come up between when you pledged and when the Indiegogo ended. That just doesn’t work for me, and it shouldn’t work for you. I want fans for life, so if any of the stuff you’ve read so far gets you excited, just try my first book for free. Then you can devour the other four books in the series, come back here, and pledge for book 5. I think that’s fair to both of us. *Insert virtual fistbump*

Q: How do I know you are going to even finish the book?

A: I started publishing in December of 2015. Since then, I’ve written and published 47 novels. Most of my books are around 80,000 thousand words (Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone is 77,000 words for comparison). My writing isn’t upper class literary masturbation. I write pulp fantasy fun stories with an easy to read conversational language style. I normally write 8,000 to 10,000 words a day, and often finish a book in a week or two. I’ll start this novel as soon as the goal is met, and I’ll probably have it finished before the Indiegogo ends. Getting the morale patch and print books will probably take a bit longer, but it should all be delivered before March is over.

 

But that question is a great segue into…

 

 

This is my first Indiegogo, but I’ve done a Kickstarter that was wildly successful. The deliverables aren’t very challenging. These are the rewards I am promising:

 

Getting the book written by the deadline.

I’m a full time author who has written and published more books than 99.9% of other authors. This will not be an issue.

Getting the audio book recorded.

The slot is already booked with the narrators, and the money has already been paid. They are recording the first 4 books right now, and we should be ready for book 5 as soon as I finish it.

Getting the cover art reward.

It’s already completed. You can see it up above.

Making the Behind the Scenes video.

Easy peasy. I just turn on my camera and start yapping about the book. It will probably be hard for me to stop talking in a reasonable amount of time. I just love going on and on about knights, loot, game mechanics, etc...

Shipping out the Morale Patch.

The design is pretty much done, I just need to have it made and shipped to my warehouse. They have told us it's a 6 week lead time, so it should be to you by end of March.

Shipping out the books.

My previous Kickstarter taught me about printing fulfillment. It take about as long as the morale patch, so you should get it by the end of March.

They have told us it's a 6 week lead time, so it should be to you by end of March.Shipping out the books.My previous Kickstarter taught me about printing fulfillment. It take about as long as the morale patch, so you should get it by the end of March.

story:
**Early bird special!  Buy two perks valued at $25 or more each before June 30, 2013 and receive a To Pearl Jam With Love drawstring backpack!

 

ABOUT THE BOOK

To Pearl Jam With Love is a unique collection of stories, love letters, thank-yous and artistic tributes to a band that has touched countless people around the world for more than two decades.  It is about the sharing of moving and inspirational stories, each unique, but at the same time connected to the band and their music.  

To Pearl Jam With Love are the words that make these stories come alive; submissions from fans, fellow musicians, collaborators, and those who have experienced firsthand the generosity that seems to flow unending from this band. 

Along with the captivating stories, the book is about artwork, photos and other stunning tributes to the band by both the amateur and professional.

Most importantly, To Pearl Jam With Love is our chance, new fan or old, famous or not, to have our Pearl Jam story heard, our thanks given and to make sure the world knows just how amazing this band and these individuals truly are.

Even if you do not consider yourself a Pearl Jam fan, you will find yourself moved and inspired by the very personal and heart-felt stories and tribues sent from all over the world.  This book is a must for any music lover!

The tentative date of the release for the advance edition of the book is December 2013.

 

In true Pearl Jam style, a portion of the proceeds from this project will benefit our charity partner, The Five Horizons Foundation, as well as a cause/charity chosen by the band.

 

We hope you will be part of this tribute to the greatest band on the planet! For more information please visit our website at www.topearljamwithlove.com

Please contribute, donate and help spread the love! 

 

 

ABOUT THIS CAMPAIGN

Our indiegogo campaign has been launched to help fund the expenses associated with the development of the book such as marketing/PR, editing, typesetting, graphic design, web development, taxes, fees, distribution, legal, etc....

The remainder of the initial funding goal is set to cover the printing of the 7 leather bound copies of the book for members of Pearl Jam past and present.  It will also help fund the cool perks offered through the campaign, as well as the first print of the book.

To Pearl Jam With Love will be printed and bound as a hardcover, full-size coffee table-style book including full color pages of beautiful artwork and photographs. 

If the campaign goal is exceeded we will use these funds to have our very cool and innovative interactive digital copy of the book developed – we can’t wait to work on this!  Further funds will be used to develop our web platform to include unique online services to the Pearl Jam community and to further assist our charity partners.

 **If you do not wish to receive your perk for your donation we would be more than happy to gift your perk to our charity partner to assist in their fundraising efforts :)

 All perk delivery charges will be billed separately at time of delivery.

Thank you for your support and your Pearl Jam love!

story:
Short Summary

For the past three years, we've been publishing a collection of fiction, poetry, essays, and art from writers and artists all over the world, and with a special focus on our town of Spokane, WA.  All of our financial support comes from our readers, and so far this has been enough to cover production costs, but not enough to pay our contributors.  This is where you come in.  Meeting our fundraising goal will allow us to support the creative endeavors of the writers and artists whose work we bring to you.

With your support we'll be able to pay each contributor in 2014 a minimum of $10 per published piece of work.

We're excited to announce the beginning of a residency program in 2014, where we'll select a writer, poet, and artist in residence from the Spokane area whose work will be published in each issue of the year.

The Perks!

Here are the available pledge items:

 

 

With every pledge amount we'll include your name in our supporter list that will appear in each issue of 2014.

 

 

You can get them with either a pin back so you can wear them or a magnet so you can put them on your fridge or whiteboard.

 

 

 

We have both digital and print subscriptions available for a full year of four issues.

 

 

Note: The photo above is of past issues.  Your one year subscription will contain all-new issues.

 

 

We have four 8" x 10" typographic prints available that have appeared in past RiverLit issues.

 

 

 

We're only making 10 of these handmade block prints!  Approximately 11" by 11".

 

If We Fall Short

If we aren't able to meet our goal, the funds we do raise will go towards adding more pages and content, miscellaneous costs that keep the magazine going, such as hosting fees and licenses, and/or next year's fundraiser.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to contribute monetarily, you can still help us spread the word.  Please share our campaign on your social network(s)!

story:
Join the Club.

Learn to be sexy, fun and fearless! This delightfully personal self-help book and website is for anyone who wants to have more chacha in her life.

Summary.

Hi. My name is Sophie Winters and I'm writing a fun and personal self-help book for women called "The Cha Cha Club Dating Man-ifesto." I need your help to raise enough funds to self-publish this ebook and build a website/blog. My goal is to help women get more cha cha in their life by dishing out advice on the subjects of men, relationships, beauty, confidence and the art of difficult conversations.

I've already written the first draft. My next step is to rewrite, polish and publish the book while simultaneously building a website/blog. TheChaChaClub.com will allow people to download the ebook, along with additional materials and resources. My hope is to eventually build an online community of women helping women to become sexy, fun, and fearless.

Where Will Your Dollars Go?

Your funds will help me:

- hire a graphic designer to help me with the book cover and artwork.

- pay for some of the legal stuff and publishing costs such as copyright, ISBN number, etc.

- build the website. 

The Difference You Will Make.

Your donation will help women around the world get more cha cha.

Need I say more?

Other Ways You Can Help.

Even if you can't contribute financially at this time, I hope you will download a copy of "The Cha Cha Club Dating Man-ifesto" and make some noise about it when it comes out. Read it, review it, and share this link with others. Spread the cha cha! You know you want to.

story:
Hello,

This campaign is to raise funds to create my first e-book., "Operation Angelica." I discovered creative writing as mid-life "awakening". The creative process has been amazing and wonderful.

Synopsis:

FBI Sniper Elizabeth Ashton's ideal life is shattered when her fiancée is killed in
Honduras, Central America. Let down by the government she serves, Ashton takes
justice into her own hands. However, she soon crosses paths with a shadowy
Washington D.C. consulting firm, Vormund/Ames, and is recruited to join the
company. Ashton learns that sometimes governments and law enforcement agencies
need an ace up the sleeve. Her first assignment is to aid in the rescue of twelve
people held hostage by rebels in Columbia, South America. With the help of
three very different men in her new life, Ashton begins the path to healing
while the Vormund/Ames team prepares for their mission. But can they get a
dying woman held prisoner for five years out in time? Can Ashton be the ace?

Any writer can tell you that the journey from first draft to publication is a long and adventurous one. I've decided to self-publish because I feel it's the best way to showcase my work.

The funds raised through this campaign will cover the costs of a professional editor, cover designer, and initial promotion. ANY and ALL support will help! In return, contributors will get, at minimum, an electronic edition of the book and a mention on the "Thank You" page. If I raise more than my $1600 goal, I'll be able to start on Book Two even faster!

Through my fictional stories, I hope to give a voice to victims of violence and crime. My heroes aren't perfect, but they try to rise above personal loss and hurt in the service of others. I will dedicate this book to all soldiers, law enforcement officers, and emergency responders who risk their lives every day.

Thank you for reading!

Find me on Twitter @JulieneLloyd

story:
Het is heel raar om een crowdfunding project op te zetten voor mijn moeder, maar ik probeer het zo goed mogelijk uit te leggen waarom ik dit doe;

Mooi

Het begon zo mooi, mijn vader Frans was 4 jaar oud en was het buurjongentje van mijn moeder, het is zelfs zo dat mijn vaders moeder heeft geholpen met de geboorte van mijn moeder, hierdoor heeft mijn vader de kans gekregen om over de rand van de wieg mijn moeder al op zeer jongen leeftijd mocht aanschouwen.

Omdat mijn moeders vader ziek was geworden voor dat ze op vakantie zouden gaan met de hele familie zijn ze inplaats van naar Italie naar mijn vaders moeder en vader gegaan, want die woonde inmiddels in Rijswijk, dat was vroeger ver weg, hierdoor kregen mijn moeder en vader weer contact en er ontstond natuurlijk een relatie, anders was ik en mijn zusje er nooit gekomen, maar voor ik en mijn zusje waren geboren begon er al een zware tijd.

Ellende

Mijn vader en moeder kregen al vroeg met heel veel verdriet te maken, tijdens de eerste zwangerschap ging het al mis, ze kreeg een miskraam met 9 maanden Angelique zou ze heten, het meest verschrikkelijke wat er toen gebeurde is dat het kindje direct werd meegenomen en heeft nooit in haar handen gelegen. Angelique is begraven in een anoniem stuk grond op begraafplaats Orthen en is pas een paar jaar geleden gevonden in de boeken van de begraafplaats en nu is er eindelijk een speciale gedenkplaat in begraafplaats Orthen voor deze kinderen.

Daarna werd Francky geboren op 6-9-1971, mijn vader en moeder dol gelukkig en mijn vader filmde veel met 8 mm film in die tijd. Het geluk werd ze helaas afgenomen door een huisarts die niet wilden luisteren en een grove inschattingsfout maakten.
Die bewuste avond heeft de huisarts namelijk gezegd dat het een simpel griepje is en hij de volgende dag wel zou komen… De volgende ochtend (27-6-1973) is Francky dood aangetroffen.

De dood van mijn broer heeft mijn vader en moeder tot de dag van vandaag heel veel verdriet bezorgt.

Weer een beetje vreugde

Op 28-08-1974 werd ik geboren, Fred van Rijswijk en op 5-9-1975 werd Audrey van Rijswijk geboren, mijn zusje.

Ziekte

Zo'n 30 jaar geleden kreeg mijn vader, zelfstandige, een hartaanval en heeft toen in het Catherine ziekenhuis in Eindhoven een open hart operatie moeten ondergaan, toen heel moeilijk en de verwachtingen waren hooggespannen, maar heeft het doorstaan, maar is wel een stuk minder vitaal geworden, maar moest omdat ie zelfstandig was weer door met werken. Door minder te kunnen werken en wat drank problemen leven we als gezin van dag tot dag en komen we rond van minima. We hebben dit nooit erg gevonden!

Mijn vader is voor zijn hart nog een paar keer terug gemoeten, dotteren, stands en wederom een open hart operatie, mijn vader werd hierdoor 100% afgekeurd en mocht niet meer werken. Mijn moeder was altijd de verzorgende en toen kwamen er Melkert banen, mijn zusje werkte in de zorg op Boswijk en mijn moeder is daar aan een baan gekomen door Melkert, super trots op ons moeder, want ze stonden altijd klaar voor mensen te verzorgen, zelfs sterfbegeleiding, nu kon ze lekker de mensen in Boswijk verzorgen, Boswijk is voor demente mensen, hier kwam naar een tijdje ook haar moeder te wonen, mijn oma, haar moeder is overleden in Boswijk en kort daarna haar vader, zou bijna zeggen van verdriet, want na meer dan 60 jaar bij elkaar zijn…

Kanker

Een aantal daarna kreeg mijn vader weer een ziekte, kanker, om specifiek te zijn keelkanker, zware operatie tot gevolg, maar gelukkig zei de dokter hebben we alles weg kunnen snijden. Helaas moest mijn vader nog een keer onder het mes, was namelijk weer keelkanker ontdekt een jaar of wat later… Mijn vader na zoveel operaties, wist niet waarom hij het nog zou laten doen…. al die ellende, maar gelukkig waren mijn zusje en ik allebei getrouwd en hebben nu allebei 2 gezonden kinderen, ik 2 meiden Iza (6) en Lotte (4) en mijn zusje, Cem (7) en Dex (2). Dus mijn vader deed het voor ons als familie.
Helaas was de 2e operatie toch nog 1 te weinig, er werd weer keel kanker ontdekt en het moest nu weer geopereerd worden.

Mijn moeder zorgde steeds voor mijn vader als hij weer uit het ziekenhuis kwam, door bezuinigingen en het op houden van de zogenaamde Melkert banen is mijn moeder tijdens herstel van een hernia operatie min of meer ontslagen en bedankt op 63 jarige leeftijd.

Moeder

Moeder die nooit ziek is en als ze ziek is nog doorgaat, ligt 's-avonds in haar bed en draait zich om, knak hoort ze en slaapt verder, in de ochtend heeft ze toch wel wat pijn in haar arm, ze gaat snel naar haar huisarts en die stuurt haar door om een foto te laten maken, snel wordt duidelijk dat het niet helemaal goed is, ze heeft haar sleutelbeen gebroken, de breuk is recht, ze kunnen aan een sleutelbeenbreuk niet veel doen, maar dat is niet het enige wat de radioloog ziet op de foto, hij ziet opvallende vlekken en met meer onderzoek direct in die week wordt al binnen 2 weken duidelijk dat ze botkanker heeft.

Dit hoort ze net voor de kerst (2012), verder in het onderzoek wordt duidelijk dat ze op meerdere plekken kanker ontdekken, lever (beide kanten), bekken en nog wat andere plekken, ze gaat direct aan de chemo! dapper! Ze word in januari 65 jaar, dat vieren we maar met een heel dubbel gevoel, met kerst dacht ze haar verjaardag niet te halen en vorige week heeft ze naar verschillende chemo's te horen gekregen dat de chemo niet werkt. De oncoloog die haar eerst het nieuws moet brengen dat ze er dood aangaat, moet ook nog een vertellen dat ze bij de 10% hoort waarvan ze niet weten waarvandaan het komt en dat het dus niet werkt en dus zou ze beter kunnen stoppen met de chemo en genieten van elke dag!

Genieten

Nu is het zo dat mijn moeder zeker geniet van alles, haar kinderen, haar kleinkinderen, naar de speeltuin, haar tuin thuis, etc. Nu zijn ze vorig jaar met (staats)steun op vakantie gemogen en gelukkig heeft ze daar volop genoten. Maar mijn moeder is de ellende zoals hierboven geprobeerd te verwoorden een beetje heel erg zat.

Nu is haar grote wens om als gezin, familie, nog een keer op vakantie te gaan, omdat dit nooit is gebeurt. Helaas zoals het gezegde voor een dubbeltje geboren word nooit een kwartje, kunnen we zelf dit niet financieel voor elkaar krijgen.

Ik wil mijn ouders nog een keer heel gelukkig zien, dat wil iedereen, maar met de 'ellende' die ze samen hebben meegemaakt wil wij dat ze nog wat wensen kan laten uitkomen.

Wensen

  • De 8 mm filmpjes op DVD zetten, zodat ze de filmpjes van Francky en van mij en mijn zusje nog eens kan terug zien wanneer zei dat wilt.
  • Een vakantie met de hele familie, liefst naar Walt Disney, maar het maakt eigenlijk totaal niet uit, als het maar samen is!
  • Een boek schrijven, ze roept al jaren dat ze een boek zou willen schrijven, haar verhaal door een schrijver geschreven.
  • Geld doneren voor thuiszorg, mensen in nood en natuurlijk voor meer kanker onderzoek.

Ieder huisje heeft zijn kruisje,

ik weet dat mijn ouders absoluut niet zielig gevonden willen worden, maar omdat we financieel wij dit niet allemaal kunnen bekostigen, vragen we de hulp van iedereen in, misschien kan ik hierdoor een paar wensen van mijn moeder laten uitkomen, al is het maar de 8 mm filmpjes.

Ik beloof ook dat er van elke euro er een gedeelte naar een kanker stichting gaat, naar onderzoek en een gedeelte naar begeleiding van kanker patiënte.

Nogmaals is het best moeilijk voor mij om duidelijk te maken dat dit niet zomaar is om op vakantie te gaan, maar om echt een wens van mijn moeder uit te laten komen.

Geen PayPal, overmaken via Bank naar: Attiq Lab, rekeningnummer 598653430 ovv Mama's wensen. Dan stort ik het door via indiegogo / paypal.

Mijn moeder was altijd de verzorgende en toen kwamen er Melkert banen, mijn zusje werkte in de zorg op Boswijk en mijn moeder is daar aan een baan gekomen door Melkert, super trots op ons moeder, want ze stonden altijd klaar voor mensen te verzorgen, zelfs sterfbegeleiding, nu kon ze lekker de mensen in Boswijk verzorgen, Boswijk is voor demente mensen, hier kwam naar een tijdje ook haar moeder te wonen, mijn oma, haar moeder is overleden in Boswijk en kort daarna haar vader, zou bijna zeggen van verdriet, want na meer dan 60 jaar bij elkaar zijn…
Kanker
Een aantal daarna kreeg mijn vader weer een ziekte, kanker, om specifiek te zijn keelkanker, zware operatie tot gevolg, maar gelukkig zei de dokter hebben we alles weg kunnen snijden. Helaas moest mijn vader nog een keer onder het mes, was namelijk weer keelkanker ontdekt een jaar of wat later… Mijn vader na zoveel operaties, wist niet waarom hij het nog zou laten doen…. al die ellende, maar gelukkig waren mijn zusje en ik allebei getrouwd en hebben nu allebei 2 gezonden kinderen, ik 2 meiden Iza (6) en Lotte (4) en mijn zusje, Cem (7) en Dex (2). Dus mijn vader deed het voor ons als familie.Helaas was de 2e operatie toch nog 1 te weinig, er werd weer keel kanker ontdekt en het moest nu weer geopereerd worden.
Mijn moeder zorgde steeds voor mijn vader als hij weer uit het ziekenhuis kwam, door bezuinigingen en het op houden van de zogenaamde Melkert banen is mijn moeder tijdens herstel van een hernia operatie min of meer ontslagen en bedankt op 63 jarige leeftijd.
Moeder
Moeder die nooit ziek is en als ze ziek is nog doorgaat, ligt 's-avonds in haar bed en draait zich om, knak hoort ze en slaapt verder, in de ochtend heeft ze toch wel wat pijn in haar arm, ze gaat snel naar haar huisarts en die stuurt haar door om een foto te laten maken, snel wordt duidelijk dat het niet helemaal goed is, ze heeft haar sleutelbeen gebroken, de breuk is recht, ze kunnen aan een sleutelbeenbreuk niet veel doen, maar dat is niet het enige wat de radioloog ziet op de foto, hij ziet opvallende vlekken en met meer onderzoek direct in die week wordt al binnen 2 weken duidelijk dat ze botkanker heeft.
Dit hoort ze net voor de kerst (2012), verder in het onderzoek wordt duidelijk dat ze op meerdere plekken kanker ontdekken, lever (beide kanten), bekken en nog wat andere plekken, ze gaat direct aan de chemo! dapper! Ze word in januari 65 jaar, dat vieren we maar met een heel dubbel gevoel, met kerst dacht ze haar verjaardag niet te halen en vorige week heeft ze naar verschillende chemo's te horen gekregen dat de chemo niet werkt. De oncoloog die haar eerst het nieuws moet brengen dat ze er dood aangaat, moet ook nog een vertellen dat ze bij de 10% hoort waarvan ze niet weten waarvandaan het komt en dat het dus niet werkt en dus zou ze beter kunnen stoppen met de chemo en genieten van elke dag!
Genieten
Nu is het zo dat mijn moeder zeker geniet van alles, haar kinderen, haar kleinkinderen, naar de speeltuin, haar tuin thuis, etc. Nu zijn ze vorig jaar met (staats)steun op vakantie gemogen en gelukkig heeft ze daar volop genoten. Maar mijn moeder is de ellende zoals hierboven geprobeerd te verwoorden een beetje heel erg zat.
Nu is haar grote wens om als gezin, familie, nog een keer op vakantie te gaan, omdat dit nooit is gebeurt. Helaas zoals het gezegde voor een dubbeltje geboren word nooit een kwartje, kunnen we zelf dit niet financieel voor elkaar krijgen.
Ik wil mijn ouders nog een keer heel gelukkig zien, dat wil iedereen, maar met de 'ellende' die ze samen hebben meegemaakt wil wij dat ze nog wat wensen kan laten uitkomen.
Wensen

De 8 mm filmpjes op DVD zetten, zodat ze de filmpjes van Francky en van mij en mijn zusje nog eens kan terug zien wanneer zei dat wilt.
Een vakantie met de hele familie, liefst naar Walt Disney, maar het maakt eigenlijk totaal niet uit, als het maar samen is!
Een boek schrijven, ze roept al jaren dat ze een boek zou willen schrijven, haar verhaal door een schrijver geschreven.
Geld doneren voor thuiszorg, mensen in nood en natuurlijk voor meer kanker onderzoek.
Ieder huisje heeft zijn kruisje,
ik weet dat mijn ouders absoluut niet zielig gevonden willen worden, maar omdat we financieel wij dit niet allemaal kunnen bekostigen, vragen we de hulp van iedereen in, misschien kan ik hierdoor een paar wensen van mijn moeder laten uitkomen, al is het maar de 8 mm filmpjes.
Ik beloof ook dat er van elke euro er een gedeelte naar een kanker stichting gaat, naar onderzoek en een gedeelte naar begeleiding van kanker patiënte.
Nogmaals is het best moeilijk voor mij om duidelijk te maken dat dit niet zomaar is om op vakantie te gaan, maar om echt een wens van mijn moeder uit te laten komen.
Geen PayPal, overmaken via Bank naar: Attiq Lab, rekeningnummer 598653430 ovv Mama's wensen. Dan stort ik het door via indiegogo / paypal.

story:
For those that are new to Haiti Uncovered below is the campaign information and project view. Our past 31 day campaign(July 1st to August 1st) raised $13,772! AMAZING support from all of you. Thank you! We didnt meet our indiegogo goal, but we showed we can come together, and we believe in positive things. You can CLICK HERE to view the past campaign. Read the comments and see the appreciation people have for this project.  This is a $40k plus project, that we must ensure come to fruition fully and completely. This project will get done. Extremely well too with your help!

Many have called and emailed to ask how they can still contirbute and continue to give. Hence why this page and our second stage. I will be relying on you to pass the word and contribute. The next couple of months will be heavily focused on research and travel on my part. But we must continue to work on all fronts.

I encourage you over the next few days/weeks to contribute if you are able to AND share it with your friends, family and colleagues. Sharing is a great way to get the word out, but it's important to show your contribution to your friends and network as well. No amount is too small. Give what you can. Those who can and wishes to give more, usually do so, and in the end, everyone is NEEDED to make this successful. Express your passion for this project honestly and others will see it too.

Haiti is not simply deprivation and misery. We have a CULTURE, A PEOPLE AND AMAZING FOOD that the world also needs to know.

Part of Proceeds from this book will go to benefit two amazing organizations: Haiti Cultural Exchange and Community2Community, check out the phenomenal work they do.

My goal is not to innovate, it is simply to contribute. It is to bring the missing piece to a puzzle in construction.

Greetings friends, I am Nadege Fleurimond, owner and operator of Fleurimond Catering Inc. an off-premise catering company operating in NY.

 

THE PROJECT: HAITI UNCOVERED

Today, I consider myself privileged to invite you to be part of a beautiful and worthwhile project that is vital to maintaning our heritage and culture. I have worked on a lot of projects, many of them my own, but I have never felt the need, nor the desire to ask for assistance outside of my small circle of friends and collaborators. This time, this project is too important to undertake alone. I need you to be part of it.

Rarely have I been as excited about a project as I am about this one. In partnership with you, I want to create, a Culinary Coffee Table Book that embraces every region and tradition of Haiti. Haiti Uncovered: A Regional Adventure into the Art of Haitian Cuisine will bring into focus the beauty of Haiti through its diverse culinary traditions. The beautifully bound and illustrated, hard cover book, slated to be released in early 2014, will present and represent the dishes and cooking traditions from the major geographical Departments.

 

The book will have an English as well as a French Version making it accessible to individuals all over the globe.


Author Edwidge Danticat is excited about this project and will be writing the forward for the book.

Why This Book Needs to be Created?

In my opinion, Food is perhaps one of the most important things within a culture. As Regine Roumain, Executive Director of Haiti Cultural Exchange states, "It is an important and vital aspect of our cultural heritage and one I think should be preserved. Everything having to do with food from the preparation to the cultivation to the way we eat altogether is a cultural act. Food is culture"

Fan Fan TiBot, Founding member and Manager of Tabou Combo, also states, "Haitians are known for music and mostly painting. But not for our cuisine. Based on our different colinization, I think Haiti has the most culturally diversified cuisine in the Caribbean. I like the project because it promotes our culture"

Showcasing Haiti has been at the forefront of everything that I have done to this point in my life and my career.  I want to use the skills that I have been blessed with to leave behind something that is needed.

Haiti Uncovered will be a book that Haitians born in Haiti can reference to learn about other parts of the country.

Haitians and Haitian-Americans in the Diaspora can learn the real breadth and scope  of Haitian cuisine . Not just Du riz ak pwa. This sense that Haitian food is limited, is a fallacy.

When Non-Haitians are interested in learning about Haiti, Haitian culture, and what the culinary culture of Haiti is really about, they can google, and find Haiti Uncovered, that gives a true depiction of the reality.

I read on an internet blog once, about someone who had moved to Haiti and they wrote, "Haitians put ketchup and sugar in their spaghetti. Haitians really like sweet foods. They put sugar in everything." 

That statement really bothered me because, while I may not know our full culinary tradition, one I am very clear about is, we do not like sweet and savory flavors for the most part, yet, the people reading this woman's blog would use her thoughts as a reference, and there is nothing out there to counter that.

We need to change that. We need to ensure that we have a complete and well presented piece of writing that will serve as a culinary, cultural and historical reference for Haiti.

 

Haiti Uncovered can serve people all over the world who are interested in a creating a sort of cultural exchange.

However, I can’t do this alone. Only a true and complete collaborative effort on many fronts can make that possible. Therefore, I need you. I need your backing and encouragement. Together, we will produce something that we can all be proud of. This book, with your participation, will become the culinary reference for Haitians and non-Haitians alike who are interested in Haitian Cuisine.

Why Do I Need You on this Journey?  

I want you to love this project as much as I do. I want you to travel the course with me. Such an undertaking will require extensive travelling and research throughout the country to speak with the people, discover and study the recipes, so that they can be reported as accurately as possible to you and the world. It will feature not only beautiful photographs of dishes and recipes, but will also include photographs of the people and will reveal in detail their food traditions, as well as locally grown ingredients. Haiti Uncovered: A Regional Adventure into the Art of Haitian Cuisine is a book that will present an accurate depiction of Haiti's culinary art. In essence, this is your chance to rediscover Haiti and to present her in a different light.

What Your Financial Support Will Mean:

 

27,500 is the minimum needed to get this project going in the right direction. However the project costs are well over $40,000. Proper research and travelling will be necessary to capture the rich culinary heritage of Haiti.

What does a day look like in Jacmel when looked through a food inspired lens?

What do the people of Jeremie eat on Sundays?


What is the festival or street food culture in Cap-Haitien?

Wedding foods of Miragoane?

From religion to other societal components, what role does food play in the lives of Haitian.

By contributing financially to the realization of this Book Project, you will permit the hiring of knowledgable and competent  professionals in all relams. From videographers, copy editors, researches, historians to the photographers that wil capture the people, the dishes and the agricultural back drop of the country.

 

Even in presenting this video to you and bringing this project to your attention, we wanted to do our best to bring something of quality. We want to continue on this path. Research has to be done and we need to go to Haiti. Numerous times. We need to visit various regions to perform adequate researchproperly document data.  We will need to print this book and more importantly, we will need to ensure that the marketing and publicity campaigns are well developed and carried out. Your contribution will make all that possible.

We also have some great perks available for your generosity.  Check them out!

What the Book Means  

For many Haitian descents and foreigners, Haitian food means Rice and Beans, Fried chicken, Tasso (seasoned fried goat), Griot (seasoned fried pork), fried fish with the occasional fried plantain.

 

But Haitian Food, well Haitian Cuisine is much more than those common dishes. It is also Tom tom, bouyon tèt kabrit, tchaka, and ragou pyé bèf. It is pitimi ak pwa, soup joumou, pwason gwo sèl, lalo, blé, labouyi banana, doukounou, mousa, koukoush, and much more.

 

It is also dessert items like dous kokoyé, chanmchanm, konparèt, dous makòs, tablèt nwa, tablet pistach, pain patate, gato manyok, bon bon sirop, beignet, and a lot more.

 

Think of learning about Cachiman, Corossol, kenep, mango, sapoti, lam veritab, labapen, acajou, and Djon djon, among others.

 

We want to represent the daily culinary experience of those in Jeremie, Gonaives, Les Cayes, Cap-Haitien, Jacmel, Port-de-Paix and others. We want to know the people. We want to know their food traditions, so we can perhaps pass down to our children.

 

With this book, we have a chance to represent our cuisine and traditions the right way and in context of our history and reality.

 

How much will all of this Project Cost us?

The project cost ranges from $40,000.00 to $60,000 depending on how extensive we want to make this. I have thought of adding a DVD Guide along with the book. However, all of that depends on how much we are able to raise.  I have already secured $8,000.00 in commitment towards the printing of the Book. I have committed $11,000 of my own funds towards this endeavor, however, I cannot do it alone. I am coming to you and the Indiegogo community for atleast $27, 500.00 as I continue to search for the money to make this project as amazing as it deserves to be. If we are able to raise more, the better the project will be. 

Author Edwidge Dandicat has landed her support to the project by agreeing to write the forward of the book. Others have already promised support of other kind. We need your support. Contribute to this project and help us create something which  truly represents the country that we know and love.

Part of proceeds from this book will benefit Haiti Cultural Exchange and Community2Community. The work these two organizations do here and in Haiti is beyond phenomenal. 

How Can you Help?

Donate!!! Donate today, then come back another day and donate again. It is important that this project spreads, and the only way that will happen is if you contribute and ask others to do the same.

It is imperative that we keep the donations constant and consistent. This project has the ability to get great backing and support if the initial support is there.

So please keep encouraging your friends, family and colleagues to support this and help us bring this project to fruition. 

Tweet, Facebook, email, call and share!

 

BOOK HOST COMMITTEE

  • Marie Wiggins
  • Catherine Dauphin
  • Zazou Pierre
  • Chef Landdy Antoine

Partners Who Support this Project (In Formation)

  • Edwidge Danticat
  • Yves "Fanfan" Joseph
  • The Haitian Times
  • The Haitian Round Table
  • www.Haitianbeatz.com
  • Community2Community
  • Haiti Cultural Exchange
  • Kitoko Insurance
  • Le Boudoire
  • UniMix Films
  • RedRooster Graphix
  • Power 102.1 FM
  • New Jerusalem Church of Nazarene- Church Ave/Bedford
  • Corn Bread & Cremasse
  • www.Rockmasters.com
  • Fabulous Events by Fab

Thank You For Being Part of the Journey!

story:
Our Story

The friendly curmudgeon Don Smudge has succinctly formulated the nine steps to figuring things out in life. And I'd love to spread his wisdom to the ends of the modern universe. This concise pocket guide is filled with sharp-tongued humor and epiphanies everyone can understand and apply to life immediately upon reading it.


What We Need & What You Get

Before a single word can be printed, we need to get the first pressing set up. And that costs money. By contributing to Don Smudge's first self-help pocket guide, you essentially are pre-ordering your very own limited edition hand-numbered copy of How to F**king Figure Things Out. You may also order one for you to keep and one to give as a gift for someone who really needs to figure things out. I mean, really does. And if that special copy is too much fanfare, plop down a finski and put in a pre-order for the regular dude's version, to be printed at a future date yet to be determined.


Other Ways You Can Help

Share this link with anyone you think would appreciate this book. It can't get printed without an initial run of support, Facebook it, tweet it, digg it, share it, f**king whatever it. And maybe this world will start to figure things out...one chapter at a time.

story:
My name is David McCracken, I am a poet.  My formal background is in Art, primarily painting, however I have been writing poetry longer than I have been an artist.  I started writing when I was a sophomore in high school to pass away the doldrums of secondary education.  I also used poetry as a means to dump my emotional garbage as I have a tendency to write away my frustrations and aggravation.  I often refer to my poetry as emotional self portraits.  My first collection of poetry; “Wallflowers Aloof” is being published by Bootstrap Publishing of Rochester, New York and will be available soon.

My campaign is geared toward funding my next collection of poetry that I have entitled “Dope on the Road”.  It is a chronicle of all of my travels, and there are many.  Traveling has been a constant theme in my life and I intend on capturing the uniqueness of my experiences.  My love of the road and traveling are the main themes and extend some themes that I touched on in ‘Wallflowers Aloof”.

I have two other collections started in addition to the two I have mentioned.  These funds would help me to continue to write more abundantly and free me from the retail shackles that I currently find myself tied to.  With each new book that I publish it will increase my income and allow me to be less dependent on regular work, or having to ask for help as I am doing here.  This is the first push toward me making a living on my own terms and producing something more important than consumer fodder.  I am seeking creative independence!

For anyone that makes any type of donation there will be a free E-version of ‘Wallflowers Aloof’ for download on Amazon.  In addition to the download I will include several other perks for more generous contributors.  Included will be autographed copies of individual poems, printed copies of ‘Wallflowers Aloof’, printed copies of ‘Dope on the Road’, autographed copies of the books, and for two lucky contributors; the original cover artwork from ‘Dope on the Road’ and ‘Wallflowers Aloof’.  Please see the perks list for specific details.

If my entire goal is not met I will still be a little more independent.  Regardless of meeting my goal or not I will use these funds to subsidize my living expenses so that I can spend more time writing than selling shoes. 

My poetic style is very unique; I have worked extremely hard to develop my own voice and message.  I enjoy exposing the status quo and exploring emotional sentiments that rarely make it to the page.  I hesitated to show my work to anyone for many years, and now that I have people are reacting very positively.  One of my poems literally brought a woman to tears.  I have never received a better compliment.  For anyone that is interested I will be happy to send a sample of my work. 

For those of you who cannot afford a fiscal contribution you can still help!!!  Help get the word out about my project, and this campaign.  Use the Indiegogo share tools to share with your friends on Facebook and Twitter.  Please encourage your friends to repost your posts and the word will spread even faster.  I consider this a form of contribution and I am willing to allow anyone that helps in any way to get in on the free E-book of ‘Wallflowers Aloof’.  In addition I will make everyone that helps in this way aware of the release date for a free E-version of ‘Dope on the Road’ once it is completed.

Thank you for spending the time to read through my campaign, and thank you in advance for any help you have provided.  This really does mean the world to me.  As my way of giving back I intend on helping Indiegogo projects as often as I can in the future.

story:
Short Summary

Your child will be delighted with these stories of a young donkey from Prince Edward Island.  In Book 1, Donkey Oatie's Impossible Dream - he wants to be a cow.  In the second book, he considers painted hoofs, earrings and other fashions before deciding that he is better off staying as he is.  In the third, he visits other animal friends in his Field Trip.

I've published KittenCat Adventures and other books, but this new series has me really excited, thanks in great part to the images created by budding illustrator Gregory MacAdam.
